title: Jordan Peterson's God Structures vs. Sam Harris God Allergy FULL Version
description:
I re-watched the 4 Jordan Peterson/Sam Harris debates and had some additional observation on what essentially happened there. Now after a couple of years of thinking about these issues here is some of what I see. 

Vancouver Debate 1 https://youtu.be/d-Z9EZE8kpo
Vancouver Debate 2 https://youtu.be/BtkwF5qA6uE
Dublin Debate https://youtu.be/ZZI-FwSQRn8
London Debate https://youtu.be/YfdaAGZvYsA
Bret Weinstein with Alister McGrath Unbelievable https://youtu.be/kRx2uNMJFnU
Jordan Peterson with Roger Scruton https://youtu.be/XvbtKAYdcZY

Religion of Israel https://amzn.to/3ekZvMl
George Marsden Soul of the American University https://amzn.to/2KiofHv
Jordan Peterson Transliminal 2014 https://youtu.be/07Ys4tQPRis
Jordan Peterson Transliminal 2017 https://youtu.be/YC1pvjyKYr4
